entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: S 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
